idea:
We are makers of a unified, patent-pending, IoT + Voice smart platform - SpeakToIoT - that can make any Wi-Fi device a voice-enabled device in no time. We are actively working with visionary manufacturers and brands in India to launch "SMART INDIA"-powered Modular Touch Switches, Fan Regulators, Smart Beds, Water-Level Controllers, LED Drivers, etc. 


Our Smart Home products work with existing wiring and any regular electrician can install them in minutes, achieving the highest level of customer simplicity and convenience. Unlike others in the market who offer Chinese software inside their Hardware, our solution offers a complete Made in India/USA package to provide data security & privacy.


SMART INDIA products provide 3 ways of control to the end consumers: 

(1) Feather-touch operations with luxury look and feel. 

(2) Mobile control from anywhere using our SMART INDIA mobile app.

(3) All popular voice assistants and their mobile apps - Amazon Alexa, Google Assistant, Samsung SmartThings, etc.
name: Karan Sheth

idea:
FILGAP INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED is formed to give innovative solutions to consumers, especially Mouth Fresheners and affordable Hand Sanitizers. The followings are worth noting:


1) HEALTHY PRODUCTS

Currently available mouth fresheners like chewing gums/candies/etc. are not healthy and contains sugar, calories, fats and also increases tooth decay which is very harmful. However, we manufacture a mouth freshener which is Sugar-free, Fat-free and Cholesterol-free and also there is no effect on teeth and gums. Lakhs of people across India will go a step towards health.


2) HEALTHY & AFFORDABLE HAND SANITIZER FOR POOR PEOPLE

Maintaining health and hygiene is very important for all the people. However, due to high cost, poor people cannot afford (not priority) to buy hand sanitizer to maintain hygiene. We have launched affordable hand sanitizer for Re.1/- sachet so that anybody can buy and use the hand sanitizer. This will motivate poor people for health and hygiene.


3) CREATING JOBS

Currently we are operating in Maharashtra and many people are working as a sales person/commission agent/distributors/super distributors. Our objective is to expand our business across India to create thousands of jobs at different levels. Apart from this, expansion and job creating in our manufacturing unit will also go along.


4) OPPORTUNITY FOR YOUTHS

We will hire newer talent from various colleges in India for jobs in Sales/Marketing/ Manufacturing /Production/R&D/etc. which will motivate new generation and they can get good opportunity in coming days.


5) CONTRIBUTING IN ECONOMY BY EXPORTING

We are also expanding our wings to globe and we have already got registration of our products in Myanmar. We are planning to go for product registration in various countries across the globe.


6) MAKING KIDS HEALTHY

Most of the kids have tooth decay due to eating chocolates however we are going to launch chocolate strips which will give same taste like chocolate without affecting on teeth and gums. Kids can enjoy chocolates without any harmful effect.
name: FILGAP INDIA PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Market Research & Consulting Company operating in ASEAN region
name: Rajiv Kokane

idea:
We are a health focused NEO Bank made for the global market with a India first approach. It is digital only, cloud native, data first bank built from scratch for the New World . It offers a high yield savings account, smart rewards program and customizable analytics. w will be a one stop shop for the financial inclusion of all health-related journeys, pain points, medical records and the health ecosystem. At large we are fixing the bridge between BFSI and Healthcare to provide a unique technology based offering to the global population which is so very concerned about the health ecosystem of their loved ones and themselves.

idea: We take pride in the reliability of our product and services, we look forward to targeting customers that value this reliability— on-time reliability or the dependable reliability .Onek MK delivers all family essential supplies to women and children in India. The business is a sole proprietorship, operating under entrepreneur Mona Kumar. It is located in Powai Mumbai and will begin operation after registrations and formalities..

idea: Media Care Brand Solutions LLP is a 360 Degree Branding & Marketing Agency specialized in PR & Digital Marketing. Headquartered out of Mumbai, the company has a spread its wings across major cities like Delhi, Ahmedabad, Hyderabad, Bangalore, Kolkata, Chennai & Chandigarh. Within just 3 years of its launch, it has made a presence in the international market and has served more than 100+ successful clients across various verticals.
